subject: Re: older voices.
author: draiga1
full_text:
Heard them just fine. If it is true, I hope it's quick and painless. Suffering frightens me more than death.

~Draiga

--- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, Frank Sumption <purplealiengirl@...> wrote:
>
> Going through my flash drive lookng for my ITCbridge login info and found
> these. That's the whole purpose of this stuff., to show life goes on.
> Especially with what's predicted for 2012. I don't know if hte doomsday
> stuff is true, but it seems unwise to think we are so smart and advanced
> that we just know better.
> 
> F-S
>
